description: Detects Mimikatz DC sync security events Author: Benjamin Delpy, Florian Roth, Scott Dermott. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Valid DC Sync that is not covered by the filters; please report
Local Domain Admin account used for Azure AD Connect
name: Mimikatz DC Sync
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4662" AND winlog.event_data.Properties:(*Replicating\ Directory\ Changes\ All* OR *1131f6ad\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2*)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.SubjectDomainName:"Window\ Manager") OR (winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:(NT\ AUTHORITY* OR MSOL_*)) OR (winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:*$))))
